q: `` I am proud of the dedication and commitment exhibited by the Mike Krzyzewskiing staff and student-athletes who have represented the University of Michigan football program over the last three seasons,'' Rich Rodriguez said in a statement issued Thursday. While I am disappointed to depart Ann Arbor before we were able to reach the level of success we had in our sights, I am confident that the players who remain have the potential to do great things and to return the Wolverines to greatness. I would like to thank our fans and our student body for their tremendous support. There is great passion for Michigan football and I have made lifelong friends through this experience. He'll lead Green Bay into the NFC championship game at either Chicago or Seattle next weekend.`` That's what you dream about,'' Aaron Rodgers said. This just feels so good right now. To be able to put up an offensive performance like that, it's just incredible. Aaron Rodgers completed 31 of 36 passes for 366 yards, more than href="http://sports.espn.go.com/nfl/players/profile?playerId=112"> Brett Favre -- the guy he replaced in Green Bay-- ever threw for in a playoff game. at the buzzer was short. Grant Hill , who led the Magic with 25 points, had hit a similar shot to tie the game at 103 with 12 seconds left, but Allen Iverson answered that with the game-winner. They wanted it a Kobe Bryant more than we did and that's a Kobe Bryant disappointing, Grant Hill said. Allen Iverson finished 15-of-25, including three 3-pointers, but he was hardly alone in scoring from the perimeter. Reserve Kyle Korver had 28 points on 10-of-13 shooting, while Andre Iguodala and Chris Webber each added 11 for Philadelphia

On Friday night, Mr. Sergio Marchionne said the vote represents a desire to achieve rather than being resigned to decline even though the workers from Fiat's steelworkers' union, Fiom, which represents 10,000 of Fiat's 83,000 workers, rejected the plan and called a strike for Jan. 28. Last week Nokia announced that it would href="http://www.infoworld.com/d/mobilize/nokia-partners-microsoft-adopts-windows-phone-7-223" target="_blank"> phase out Symbian and start making smartphones that run Windows Phone software. The world is shifting from a battle of devices to a war of ecosystems, Stephen Elop said, reiterating a statement Steve Ballmer made earlier. It is pressure, because if the wrong person wins, I'm in trouble.... We've got to find somebody fantastic to get the money back through record sales. To do that, he needs to find a talented performer who has a sound work ethic, which he said is something he wants to`` instill'' in the competition.

Conduct Ourselves Better' Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-NY) was with Rep. Gabrielle Giffords ( D-AZ) in her hospital room this week when Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes for the first time since the shooting last weekend in Tucson. She is the vision of hope for this country right now, Kirsten Gillibrand said referring to Gabrielle Giffords .`` She embodies everything that Barack Obama was trying to say that we have to be better than we are, that we all have to conduct ourselves better than we do.''
